feed.title: FediFetcher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for FediFetcher: v7.1.8
entry.content:
The headline new feature in v7.1.7 and 7.1.8 of FediFetcher is that we now support a custom instance blocklist. This is controlled through the instance-blocklist configuration option, which is an optional comma seperated list of instance domains that FediFetcher should never attempt to connect to.

Update instructions

For full instruction, please see the Updating FediFetcher documentation

Changelog

  • Add support for instance banlist by @bentasker in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/161
  • Use xxHash to hash robots cache file names for improved performance by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/157
  • Update k8s example [#159] by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/162
  • Update version string on tagged releases by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/158
  • remove file accidentally committed in #140 by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/165
  • Remove unused code, correct spelling by @AndrewKvalheim in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/164
  • updates github action to increment version by @bdmorin in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/166
  • Move docs to Wiki by @nanos in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/169

New Contributors

  • @bdmorin made their first contribution in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/166
  • @bentasker made their first contribution in https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/pull/161

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nanos/FediFetcher/compare/v7.1.6...v7.1.8
